name: "Glow Ball" - The billiard puzzle game
description:
Physics based puzzle game type of billiards.
If you like billiard games or love pool then this game is for you!

Features:
* New view on the game of billiards
* Unusual and challenging levels
* Each level is unique in its design
* Each level has its own innovations
* Beautiful dynamic lighting
* The leisurely meditative gameplay
* Atmospheric soundtrack
